headline.main: SOVIET LINE CUT SOUTH OF MOSCOW; Swing Around Tula Admitted -- Berlin Reports Deep Stab Aimed to Circle Capital

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 26 -- Powerful German forces have achieved a new break-through southeast of Moscow and have turned north in the opening phases of a developing battle of encirclement, official Soviet advices acknowledged tonight.
abstract: USSR line cut, south of Moscow; battle described; USSR claims new German attacks beaten back, Mozhaisk and Maloyaroslavets; Germans threatened, Rostov; Moscow pincers blocked; German tactics same as those in Leningrad drive
snippet: LONDON, Nov. 26 -- Powerful German forces have achieved a new break-through southeast of Moscow and have turned north in the opening phases of a developing battle of encirclement, official Soviet advices acknowledged tonight....
